rules.content: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.
{i}Renew{/i} {-} {2}{b}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put X -1/-1 counters on target creature, where X is the number of noncreature cards in your graveyard. Activate only as a sorcery.
